website_summaries.verdict: Add a personal touch to your shower with this customizable banner.
pros: Kit includes 72 letter plates and and 8 floral plates for you to make your own custom banner
Colorful tassels, tissue paper pom-poms, and ribbon also included
Can be reused at a variety of future parties
cons: The number of each type of letter ranges from 1 to 5

customer_reviews.title: Allow at least 6 to 7 man hours for assembly of product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a baby shower it was a big hit! Personalized banner and all the decor was very festive. What one needs to know, is it takes a long time to assemble the product, allow at least 6 to 7 hours! Very easy to assemble just very time consuming, luckily I decided to do in advance or I would have been in trouble! This isn’t pull a string and done, you have to work every piece of fine tissue paper into place. Everyone loved the end result and raved about it, but I would never have ordered had I known what a time eater it was!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this decorating kit to celebrate my daughter's birthday, and the decor lit up the room. Extremely beautiful. My daughter loved it. You have to make the tassels and pom poms, but for me it was fun to do, and it was not hard at all. My husband and I did it together. It can be a little time consuming, so give yourself time to decorate. Well worth the time and purchase!! The pictures really do not show how beautiful the decorations looked in person, but I wanted to give you a peak. Order came in quick.
customer_reviews.author: Verified customer!

customer_reviews.title: Very Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The sign is beautiful. I bought it because we are distance learning and I wanted to make my office more like my classroom. The sign is beautiful. Lots of letters. Nice colors. Plenty of ribbon!
customer_reviews.author: One2swee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Got lots of compliments. The tassels were a pain to put together, but the rest was easy. Flowers a little time consuming and we had to improvise. Very nice overall
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Maine, William Maine

customer_reviews.title: The amount of decorations for the price is right on the money.
customer_reviews.text: The design of the banner and the decorations met the appearance on the Amazon website. . However, I was thinking I should have assembled it the night before it was abit time consuming. The strings that that hold the banner were easily frayed, we had to trim them alot, overall I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Laticia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Celebration Set
customer_reviews.text: The poofs were hard to make and very time consuming. Better instructions for those would have been helpful, but all the materials and the color palette is beautiful. I also love that the banner letters can be reused for many occasions given the quantity of letters provided. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michd429

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my second purchase from this brand!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! My cousin is having a baby shower and wanted the same decorations my sister in law had at her party. I found the same decorations but with a free table cloth and a new sash included! The free table cloth is really helpful and my cousin loves the sash! She’s very happy with the decorations and everyone in our family is commenting on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product - needs some time to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The various items came well packaged. The letters were beautiful and easy to string together to form the banner for our event. However, the tassels and flowers took some time to put together. The finished product, however, was lovely and was a big hit at the event. Everyone loved it! I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: KPersad

customer_reviews.title: pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: the product was pretty but a pain to set up and took a lot of time, and letters curled after a short time of being up
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: My banner turned out so nice for my Moms Celebration of Life party. Well constructed and easy to assemble Takes a little time but we just assembled them while we watched tv. Kind of soothing to do also.
customer_reviews.author: Danismom

customer_reviews.title: Decor for my gender reveal!
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect for my gender reveal. I didn’t need to buy deprecate decorations- it was just enough. We were able to spell out what we wanted, decorate the foot garage and our dessert table. When planning I recommend you set up the pom poms and the decorative flower balls ahead of time! It makes setting up a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: We used this to welcome home my new grandson after being hospitalized for 3 weeks. It’s very festive and I loved that I could personalize it. It comes with more than enough letters to be used for numerous occasions. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: So elegant looking and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought these decorations for our daughter’s Baby shower. They were so elegant, classy and very easy to assemble! We will definitely order products from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a friend's going-away party. It was easy to customize the banner message and looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: nevadablue51

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Thin paper with some balloon strings. Definitely not worth what you pay. In American sense, this should be $6 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for an awesome banner!
customer_reviews.text: I used this at my daughter's Woodland Animals themes baby shower. I was amazed at how many letters there were and everyone loved it. The colors are exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for daughter’s birthday
customer_reviews.text: These turned out great! Love the colors. Just took forever to make..
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors, easy assembly, and all the letters it has to form a variety of messages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful kit.. everything included!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was PERFECT for decorating the house to welcome home my twin grand babies. There were enough elements included that I was able to spread over several rooms and I had a lot left over. We didn’t know name or gender so being able to personalize after they were born was essential. My daughter loved it. I would absolutely purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of letters
customer_reviews.text: I like the letters and the pom pons. The tassel looks ok. With 72 letters, I have plenty left and it is fun to try and assemble an additional creative banner. Maybe get a shower game going? Guess with letter the baby name will start with? Wvweything is great quality and I am already looking for takers that could re-use
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of decorations at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This package included everything needed to make our office baby shower a success. The Mom-to-be was thrilled with the decorations, which found their way to her desk after the party. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great price for so much product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for the amount of supplies included. The pictures very accurately depicted the items' colors and design. I could not make the pom poms and banners for the price of this product. I used these for a baby shower and will definitely be able to reuse for a future event. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ThiesEm

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to put together. The finished product was beautiful. I'm going to keep the pieces so I can reuse them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Decor.
customer_reviews.text: We like the color combination. It looks elegant on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We loved this decoration set everyone asked us where we got it from, very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Al Jayyousi

product_meta.title: Personalized Banner, 72 Alphabet Letters Plus 12 Pom Poms and 16 Tissue Tassels, Fall Mint Peach Cream Gold Colors, Boho,Baby Shower, Birthday,Wedding Decorations,Bridal Shower,Create Your Greeting
feature_bullets: Create your own greeting with customizable party garland! This set lets you add the perfect message to any event! Spell out your personalized message and add an elegant touch to your next get together!

The whole set includes 72 assorted alphabet tiles, 8 flower tiles, and one 5-yard ribbon to create multiple personalized messages for your event. Plus, the set features 16 tissue tassels stretching 13.5 inches long, and an assortment of 12 tissue pom poms in peach, mint, ivory and gold.

Use these decorations for weddings, bridal showers, baby shower decorations, neutral gender reveal parties, pregnancy announcements, 1st birthdays, birthday party decorations for women, men, girls or boys, Easter, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, graduations, young wild and three decorations, Hallooween, Christmas, tribal party decorations or simply for a bedroom, nursery, or office space.

These floral wreath letter tiles feature gold font with a mint, peach and cream color palate. These stunning boho party decorations have a gorgeous color palate that compliments any party and can be used over and over again along with the tassel garlands and tissue pom poms. Coral and mint party decorations are trendy and perfect for a mint green baby shower or vintage baby shower decorations.

Reusable! String together any message you want with Qutechat’s elegant pink and teal party decorations! The beautiful color palate and durable material make this party garland perfect to use again and again even for shabby chic classroom décor, classroom ceiling decorations, shabby chic baby shower decorations, boho chic party decorations and more! Just spell out your greeting and hang anywhere!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars68 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
